name: Davidoff - Signature - 4000
additionalNotes: Davidoff Signature Series has been a staple in the humidors of discerning cigar enthusiasts for years, and if you haven’t tried one yet, you’re in for a real treat. Utilizing only the finest, perfectly-aged tobaccos, Davidoff Signature is consistently delicious. Available in a wide variety of sizes, there’s bound to be a Davidoff Signature that fits your preferences. These cigars are handmade in the Dominican Republic, featuring an Ecuador Connecticut wrapper leaf over Dominican binders and long-fillers. Each cigar delivers a smooth profile of natural tobacco and cream, with a clean and elegant finish.
